comments:
Description:
IllegalStateException is thrown out when add a new column mapping in XML data set

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a XML dataset, add one column mapping, preview result, it is ok, save the report
2. Edit the dataset again, add another column mapping, do not click the table preview button in Edit Data Set dialog, click the OK button directly

Expected result:
New column mapping is added, and can preview the data

Actual result:
IllegalStateException is thrown out, and you can't add new column mapping to this dataset

Error log:
